sudoku-desc: Sudoku game, made using the py-sudoku package and tkinter
ufo-desc: Manages the presence of people for the activities at UFO Saronno
ai-desc: A REST API for sharing, browsing, and upvoting AI prompts
ecommerce-desc: Example of an e-commerce with Flask and Google login
colorgame-desc: A small game made using JavaScript
invaders-desc: Just a Space Invaders clone to learn python and pygame
